name: autocomplete-pic
description: Campo auto completar com seleção a partir de fonte de dados
description_en_US: Auto complete field with selection from data source

pic-source.onSave: javascript:function() {​ var eventName = arguments[0]; if (eventName && eventName.substr(0,2) === '{​{​' && eventName.substr(eventName.length -2, 2) === '}​}​') {​ eventName = eventName.substr(2, eventName.length - 4); eventName = eventName.replace('.attr()', '');  }​  return eventName; }​
